French: La bibliothèque est au coin de la rue.
English: The library is at the end of the street.
The school is behind the house.

French: Le supermarché est near the park.
English: The supermarket is near the park.
The beach is to the right.
I'm going to the city center.

French: Le centre-ville est plein de magasins.
English: The city center is full of stores.
